thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wuhan P&S Information Technology sees FY 2017 net profit to up 575.8 pct to 603.3 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wuhan P&S Information Technology sees FY 2017 net profit to up 575.8 pct to 603.3 pct

organizations.name: wuhan p&s information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Wuhan P&S Information Technology Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 575.8 percent to 603.3 percent, or to be 320 million yuan to 333 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 47.3 million yuan
* Says growth of sales scale and profitability, and consolidated statements includes newly acquired firms as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/5TjAkp
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
